name: Blood Friday
description:
IF YOU DONT HEAR HOW DOORS OPEN PLEASE RELOAD PAGE!!!

It's hard to stay mentally stable these days. Still, you can try to relax: just listen to the music and watch your breathing and...OH NO! What is that?!!

Your thoughts are out of control, heartbeat is speed up and even music transforms into the soundtrack of a pure RAGE.
You feel how somebody's neck is crunched under the pressure of your bat...and from now it's the only thing that satisfies your lust...

Blood Friday - is an ultraviolent 2D rhythm-slasher with a fancy "paper" graphics.
Tap the W A S D in sync with a music rhythm to blow everybody's heads around you.
